post1.title: About Python language !
post1.text: Now a day Python is one of the most popular programming language because of its features. New programmers are very interested in python more than any other languages cause it is easy to learn, open source, free, large libary, support and more.With this language we can boost our data science project or data science related career. Python is also used for website development. It works in back-end. Its syntex is easy, as like as english language. But it has a problem. It is slower than C/C++ languages cause its a interpreted language.
